name: FileInfo
author: TheHive-Project
description: Parse files in several formats such as OLE and OpenXML to detect VBA macros, extract their source code, generate useful information on PE, PDF files...

configurationItems.name: manalyze_enable
configurationItems.description: Wether to enable manalyze submodule or not.

configurationItems.name: manalyze_enable_docker
configurationItems.description: Use docker to run Manalyze. Can be used only if not using the docker image of FileInfo

configurationItems.name: manalyze_enable_binary
configurationItems.description: Use local binary to run Manalyze. Need to compile it before!

configurationItems.name: manalyze_binary_path
configurationItems.description: Path to the Manalyze binary that was compiled before. Keep the default value if using the docker image of FileInfo

configurationItems.name: floss_enable
configurationItems.description: Enable the use of FireEye FLARE FLOSS

configurationItems.name: floss_minimal_string_length
configurationItems.description: Length of strings must be in order to be considered.
